    • ActiveBatch

    Features

    • Job Step Library

      Access hundreds of pre-built job step templates requiring no scripting.

    • Reporting and Monitoring

      Get fully customizable reporting and flexible monitoring and alerting capabilities.

    • Event-Driven Job Scheduling

      Trigger automation based on events and more advanced scheduling features.

    • Security, Auditing and Governance

      Keep systems and data safe with controlled access across on-premises, hybrid and cloud.

    • Views and Interfaces

      Work within user-friendly interfaces and capture information in different views.

    • Cloud Provisioning

      Leverage provisioning capabilities to maximize cloud infrastructure investments and resources.

    • SLA Management

      Automatically manage, monitor and prevent failure of service level agreements (SLAs).

    • Architecture and High Availability

      Experience high availability in the event of outages or failures with flexible, scalable architecture.

  • Use Cases

    Use Cases

    • Workload Automation

      Orchestrate business processes end-to-end across your tech stack.

    • File Transfer Automation

      Securely and seamlessly automatically transfer data and files for jobs.

    • IT Automation

      Integrate and automate critical processes in your IT landscape.

    • Data Warehouse & ETL Automation

      Simplify end-to-end ETL processes for real-time data warehousing.

    • Business Process Automation

      Automate multi-step business processes end-to-end, from simple to complex.

    • Cloud Infrastructure Automation

      Maximize cloud infrastructure resources with agile automation.


    • SQL Server Automation

      Integrate and automate Microsoft SQL Server processes end-to-end.

    • ServiceNow Automation

      Manage and resolve incidents automatically by integrating ServiceNow.

    • SharePoint Automation

      Automatically execute Microsoft Sharepoint tasks with seamless integration.

ActiveBatch Job Steps Library

Easily build and automate jobs without development skills

Get a Demo

Largest library of automated job steps

ActiveBatch provides your team with hundreds of production-ready job steps to easily assemble into IT and business workflowsâ€”no custom scripting or advanced development skills required. Free up IT and development resources to focus on innovation.

End-to-end automation

Seamlessly integrate across a wide range of applications, databases, platforms and more to facilitate true end-to-end job automation and data exchange between disparate technologies.

No custom scripting

Eliminate the need for new custom scripts without losing existing scripts. Script vaulting and lifecycle management capabilities, like auditing and versioning, let you combine existing scripts with pre-built.

Proven-effective job steps

Use job steps designed, tested and maintained by a team of automation experts. Leverage proven-effective reusable job steps for common processes to maximize efficiency in your workflows.

ActiveBatch Service Library

ActiveBatch Job Steps Library is augmented by the ActiveBatch Service Library, a dynamic framework that extends ActiveBatch’s integration capabilities with additional actions from other applications. Load and execute APIs (WSDLs and SOAP Web Services, RESTful services, .Net assemblies, stored procedures and command lines) without custom coding and create reusable job steps for your Job Steps Library.
